title: Kickhopping Certification
desc: Kick-Hopping will help get your students in shape, transform their body, and live an active lifestyle. It?s a new cutting edge form of fitness that incorporates kick-boxing, cardio boot camp/plyometric exercise, and dance to hip-hop inspired music. Kick-Hopping works your entire body in a short period of time by going from one exercise to another with short recovery periods. The workout is easy, fun and effective! Learn to teach all of Leo's signature Kickhopping moves in this 6 hour non-stop teacher trainer workshop.
